content.description:
This little crag is about a mile down the road from the rest of rumney... It hosts 3 nice flows of ice right next to the road ranging from WI3 to WI4... They are short (about 30-40ft) but really fun, each with its own unique style... there are nice trees above the climbs making an ideal crag to set up top ropes away from the crowds... names are listed in the guide book so if someone knows specifics please let me know... 

  Make sure to park well off the road so not to obstruct the road (there is no real parking area)...
